30:       @message + "\n" +
31:       "ACTUAL:\n" +
32:       "=======\n" +

34:       "\n" +

matches?(actual_options) click to toggle source 
    # File spec/matchers/include_options.rb, line 7
 7:     def matches?(actual_options)
 8:       @actual_options = actual_options
 9:       @actual_options.each do |k, v|
10:         if !@expected_options.has_key?(k)
11:           @message = "actual has a key that was not expected: #{k}"
12:           return false
13:         end
14:         if v != @expected_options[k]
15:           @message = "expected #{@expected_options[k]}, got #{v} for key: #{k}"
16:           return false
17:         end
18:       end
19:       @expected_options.each do |k, v|
20:         if !@actual_options.has_key?(k)
21:           @message = "actual is missing a key that was in expected: #{k}"
22:           return false
23:         end
24:       end
25: 
26:       true
27:     end
